responses.body:
{
  "recipes": [
      
    {
      "id":1,
      "name": "California Roll",
      "chef": "Akira T",
      "category": "Sushi",
      "description": "Sushi de salmón, aguacate y queso crema envuelto en alga nori.",
      "image": "https://media.istockphoto.com/id/1354366250/es/foto/juego-de-rollos-de-sushi-uramaki-arco-iris-con-aguacate.jpg?s=612x612&w=0&k=20&c=5690maI0BJd7Yk4PdqrcOQOJ6ZUbs8kvSvgg7khN4Dc=",
        "recipeSteps": ["Dentro", "Alga Nori", "carne de cangrejo", "Aguacate","Por fuera","Sushi Rice","Masago"]

    },
        {
      "id":2,
      "name": "Sushi Pepino Roll",
      "chef": "prueba",
      "category": "Sushi",
      "description": "Sushi de salmón, aguacate y queso crema envuelto en alga nori.",
      "image": "https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/b/rollos-de-sushi-del-pepino-36693786.jpg",
        "recipeSteps": ["1 Pepino","1 lata de atun", "1 cebolla roja", "1 tomate", "sal pimienta", "limon", "Mayonesa vegana"]

    },
    {
      "id":3,
      "name": "Nigiri Sushi",
      "chef": "Nombre del chef",
      "category": "Sushi",
      "description": "Este Sushi es una pequeña porcion de arroz avinagrado, moldeado am¿ mano y con una rebanada de pescado o marisco encima",
      "image": "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTlJMsHm0aysoNyIW2Pk6Gs41kECMGaDHtGfA&s.jpg",
        "recipeSteps": ["500 gramos de arroz para sushi ya cocido y sazonado","500 gramos de lomos de pescado limpios de piel y espinas: salmón, atún, ventresca de atún, bonito, lubina, pez limón", "½ cucharada sopera de pasta de wasabi", "Tiras de nori", "2 huevos y azúcar si vamos a hacer sushi de huevo (tamago)", "1 puñadito de  Jengibre encurtido","Salsa de soja o salsa tamari"]
    },
            {
      "id":4,
      "name": "Sushi Dragon Roll",
      "chef": "Emily S",
     "category": "Sushi",
      "description": "Hamburguesa con carne de res, lechuga, tomate y queso cheddar.",
      "image": "https://foreignfork.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/DragonRoll-FEATURE-500x500.jpg ",
        "recipeSteps": ["Precalienta el horno", "Cocina la carne", "Arma la lasagna", "Hornea"]

    }
  ]
}
responses.label: (copy)

responses.body:
{
  "recipes": [
            {
      "id":1,
      "name": "Hamburguesa de Pollo",
      "chef": "Emily S",
     "category": "Hamburguesa",
      "description": "Hamburguesa con carne de res, lechuga, tomate y queso cheddar.",
      "image": "https://media.istockphoto.com/id/539243164/es/foto/hamburguesa-de-pollo-crocante.jpg?s=612x612&w=0&k=20&c=P_7Je2Yi7sTU1omUv8Q_mcRte02uE2hRsJOiw5PKzjc=",
        "recipeSteps": ["3 pechugas de pollo", " 1 huevo", "1  diente de ajo", " 1/4 de cebolla", "perejil", "pan rallado","aceite de oliva", "sal y pimienta"]
    },
    {
      "id":2,
      "name": "Hamburguesa Clásica",
      "chef": "Emily S",
     "category": "Hamburguesa",
      "description": "Hamburguesa con carne de res, lechuga, tomate y queso cheddar.",
      "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571091718767-18b5b1457add?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTR8fGhhbWJ1cmd1ZXNhfGVufDB8fDB8fHww",
        "recipeSteps": ["Precalienta el horno", "Cocina la carne", "Arma la lasagna", "Hornea"]

    },
    {    "id":3,
      "name": "Hamburguesa Vegana",
      "chef": "Nombre del Chef",
     "category": "Hamburguesa",
      "description": "Hamburguesa con carne de res, lechuga, tomate y queso cheddar.",
      "image": "https://carta.fostershollywood.es/productos/detalle/15-20104.png",
        "recipeSteps": ["Espinacas salteadas", "Cebolla", "Perejil fresco", "Cliantro fresco", "Queso vegano ","Mostaza","Guacamole",""]
      },
    {    "id":4,
      "name": "Hamburguesa BBQ",
      "chef": "Nombre del Chef",
     "category": "Hamburguesa",
      "description": "Hamburguesa con carne de res, lechuga, tomate y queso cheddar.",
      "image": "https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/b/hamburguesa-del-bbq-con-tocino-y-cebollas-71619920.jpg",
        "recipeSteps": ["800gr de carne molida de res", "100ml de BBQ Mr. Wings®", "55g huevo", "4 piezas de pan de hamburguesa", "200g queso cheddar amarillo ","200g de tocino ahumado","200g lechuga italiana",""]
      }
  ]
}
